title: Curing: Salt as a Preservative
description: Learn Curing: Salt as a Preservative in one minute.

hook.text: Before refrigerators, sailors survived on salt pork that lasted months at sea. Salt saved lives.

buildup.text: Salt draws water out of food through osmosis, creating an environment too dry for most bacteria.

discovery.text: At 10%+ salt concentration, most harmful bacteria simply cannot survive or reproduce.
